filter.name: JavaScript Beautifier Filter
filter.description:
Beautifies JavaScript files, it can allow instrumenting JavaScript. The following configuration parameters are used:
[beautifier] The fully qualified class name of JavaScriptBeautifier, or a subclass.

filter.name: Visualization Filter
filter.description: Logs HTTP Protocol conversation between Client and Server. Output is written to logfile. Should only be used for debugging, because logfile can get very large. @URL "html/filters/visualization_filter.html"
